nodes.text: This dining room or dining hall was located on Cloud City. Accompanying his compatriots for what they believed to be some light but deliciously satisfying refreshments, as well as a brief mention of a plan to get Imperial influence out of Cloud City, Lando Calrissian led them towards this room, and their betrayal. Waiting within the confines of this room were both Darth Vader and Boba Fett. With the closure of the room's doors the heroes' fate was sealed. What exactly transpired behind those closed doors, and whether anyone was inclined to consume the prepared delicacies, is unknown.

In both the standard Robot Chicken episode Moesha Poppins and the special Robot Chicken: Star Wars Episode II, one of the clips featured an extension of the dining room betrayal scene featuring what happened during the actual dinner. Calrissian made a brief quip about his betrayal, Vader inquires about Alderaan to Organa, and Solo and Fett non-verbally taunt each other with the food.
